articles.title: Lionel Messi's MLS season ends with Miami loss to Charlotte - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Lionel Messi returned to the starting lineup but couldn't prevent his first MLS season ending in defeat as Charlotte FC beat Inter Miami 1-0 in a dramatic contest in front of a crowd of 66,101 at Bank of America Stadium.

articles.title: Verstappen takes US F1 Sprint win ahead of Hamilton - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen came out on top at the F1 Sprint from the Circuit of the Americas.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen has won the sprint race from the Circuit of the Americas, converting his pole position into victory.
